query.name: comment-list
query.comment: Get the list of comments associated with given database entity
query.sql: SELECT c.id, post.id, post.title, u.name, e.email, c.create_date, c.status FROM awa_post AS post INNER JOIN awa_acl AS acl ON acl.entity_id = post.blog_id AND acl.entity_type = :table AND acl.user_id = :user_id AND acl.permission = $permission[blog-update-post] INNER JOIN awa_comment AS c ON c.entity_type = :entity_type AND c.entity_id = post.id INNER JOIN awa_user AS u ON c.author_id = u.id INNER JOIN awa_email AS e ON u.email_id = e.id WHERE post.blog_id = :blog_id ORDER BY c.create_date DESC
